plot: Two railway officials buy an old railway in Kleinbach and starts to transport tourists. Their services include champagne, dancing and sex.
title: Liebesgrüße aus der Lederhose 4: Die versaute Hochzeitsnacht
plot_es: Two railway officials buy an old railway in Kleinbach and starts to transport tourists. Their services include champagne, dancing and sex.
